name: Civitas - Plan, develop, and manage the city of your dreams!
blurb: Establish the perfect city! Terraform the land, plan your city & develop it. Moddable, community driven, DRM free, Single/Multi Player!

rewards.reward: Our eternal thanks for helping make Civitas become a reality! With your help we will be making this game as amazing as we all know it can be!\r\n\r\nWe also consider this donation a way to quantify the amount of people, even if they aren't a fan of our type of game directly, that support DRM free delopment and community freedom, and want to see the draconian DRM antics of clueless publishers ceased.Your name will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer.

One digital download copy of the first release version of Civitas at this pre-release price. Your name will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer.

Automatic entrance into our BETA program, with full access to all beta updates and revisions while Civitas is in development. \r\n\r\nAlso, one digital download copy of the first release version of Civitas. Your name will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer.

THREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPIES of the first release version of Civitas AUTOMATIC ENTRANCE FOR THREE into our BETA program, with full access to all beta updates and revisions while Civitas is in development. THREE NAMES of your choice will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer. Also a nice new Civitas T-Shirt.

FOR NON US Residents: \r\nTHREE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD COPIES of the first release version of Civitas AUTOMATIC ENTRANCE FOR THREE into our BETA program, with full access to all beta updates and revisions while Civitas is in development. THREE NAMES of your choice will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer. Also a nice new Civitas T-Shirt.

FOR NON US Residents:\r\n\r\n2 Civitas T-Shirts and three special digital wallpapers in various resolutions for your PC/MAC and most popular cell phones. Also a Civitas poster autographed by the development team and a limited edition Civitas decal will be sent along with your T-Shirts. Automatic entrance into our BETA program, with full access to all beta updates and revisions while Civitas is in development. Also, five digital download copies of the first release version of Civitas. Your name will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer.

Also, five digital download copies of the first release version of Civitas. Your name will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a contributer.

FOR NON US Residents: \r\nAn in-game custom monument will be created in your honor. This monument wil be a default building in the building type "Monuments" and will feature a short quote of your choosing. It will be included in the final retail version of Civitas. You will also be invited to our invite only on-line monthly production meetings, where you can as questions or offer input directly to the production team. Also a Civitas poster autographed by the development team will be sent along with your T-Shirt. Also, five digital download copies of the first release version of Civitas. Your name will also be featured on the website for the game, as well as in the game credits as a producer.
